extension.name: System - Membership Schedule Content
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 3, or later
extension.description: This plugin allows you to manage and release articles for your subscribers in the schedule you want

field.name: number_new_articles_each_time
field.label: Number New Articles Each Time
field.description: Number new articles you can setup each time

field.name: release_article_older_than_x_days
field.label: Release Articles Older Than X Days
field.description: If enter a number here, articles older than this entered number days will be free to access to everyone

field.name: redirect_menu_item
field.label: Redirect Menu Item
field.description: Choose the menu item which users will be redirected to when they try to access to an article which is not allowed to access yet

field.name: show_on_frontend
field.label: Show On Frontend
field.description: If set to Yes, this plugin will be available on frontend add/edit plan form
